content.p: Associate Professor, Dr. Wong's academic journey began with a Bachelor of Engineering (Hons.) in Mechanical from Multimedia University, Malaysia. He continued his studies with a Master of Engineering in Mechanical from Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, followed by a PhD in Mechanics and Energetics from Institut Sup√©rieur de l'Automobile et des Transports (ISAT), France. He is a Chartered Engineer with the Engineering Council UK, a Chartered Member of the Institution of Mechanical Engineers (IMechE), and a Fellow of the Higher Education Academy (HEA). He is also a Senior Graduate Member of The Institution of Engineers, Malaysia, and a Graduate Engineer of the Board of Engineers Malaysia (BEM). Currently, Dr. Wong serves as an Associate Professor at the Department of Mechanical, Materials, and Manufacturing Engineering. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
